name: moleapp-subgraph
description: Goldsky subgraph for MoleApp multi-chain transaction indexing

scripts.build:sepolia: graph codegen networks/sepolia.yaml && graph build networks/sepolia.yaml
scripts.build:arb-sepolia: graph codegen networks/arbitrum-sepolia.yaml && graph build networks/arbitrum-sepolia.yaml
scripts.build:chapel: graph codegen networks/chapel.yaml && graph build networks/chapel.yaml
scripts.build:all: npm run build:sepolia && npm run build:arb-sepolia && npm run build:chapel
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:sepolia && npm run deploy:arb-sepolia && npm run deploy:chapel
